entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
